sections.heading: Local administration and enforcement
sections.text: A local governmental unit that has adopted any ordinance, resolution, or law regulating radon resistant construction may provide for its administration and enforcement.

sections.heading: Local standards. sections.text: Local standards. Governmental units may adopt, pursuant to local ordinance, regulations at least as stringent as the rules promulgated by the Agency or may, by ordinance or resolution, adopt the rules promulgated by the Agency for radon resistant construction and the fixtures, materials, and design and installation methods of radon resistant construction systems. The rules promulgated by the Agency may be incorporated in the ordinance or resolution by reference.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect June 1, 2013, except that this Section and Section 97 take effect upon becoming law.
